entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early in the evening. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
